Package de.mikosninebites.frontend

Class CentralPanel

java.lang.Object
de.mikosninebites.frontend.CentralPanel
public class CentralPanel extends Object
The CentralPanel class represents the central panel of the ordering application. It contains the UI elements for displaying a list of available products, their prices and images, as well as buttons for adding them to the order. The panel is organized into rows of 3 products per row and each product is displayed with its name, price and image.
Author:
mikolaj korzeniewski (github: bojack2)

      productRows - - An array of HBoxes, each representing a row of products
      drawnNumbers - - A list of integers representing the indices of the user's favourite products

    • createVboxWithProductRows

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox createVboxWithProductRows(javafx.scene.control.Label[] productNames, javafx.scene.control.Label[] productPrices)
      Creates a VBox containing multiple HBoxes, each representing a row of products. Each HBox contains three products with their respective name and price labels and a button.
      Parameters:
      productNames - an array of Label objects representing the name of each product
      productPrices - an array of Label objects representing the price of each product
      Returns:
      a VBox containing the HBoxes with the products and their respective labels

    • createProductWithLabels

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox createProductWithLabels(javafx.scene.control.Button product, javafx.scene.control.Label name, javafx.scene.control.Label price)
      Method returns a VBox containing a product button with labels of name and price.
      Parameters:
      product - the product button to be included in the VBox
      name - the product label to be included in the VBox
      price - the product price label to be included in the VBox
      Returns:
      VBox containing the product label, button and price label.
